name: Attributes_putTest
description: Unit tests for the put method of the Attributes class.

test_cases.name: testPutNewKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when adding a new key-value pair to the Attributes.

test_cases.name: testPutExistingKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when updating an existing key-value pair in the Attributes.

test_cases.name: testPutNullKey
test_cases.description: Tests the put method when attempting to add a null key, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
